name: One Drop
storyline: The Quall Planet, situated in the 8th planetary system of Galaxy 38. Despite the captain's opposition, the squad led by Leader Lileef finds itself crash-landed on an unknown planet. Faced with adversity, the Halo(exploration robot) fortunately regains functionality and undertakes the mission to transmit a rescue signal...
summary: Escape from an unknown planet with only your control and wit! One Drop is a 2D action platformer game with a special universe. Explore all parts of the planet, understand the universe and try to escape.
